definition: everybody/all (guests, colleagues etc)/all of you
each/every
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
(of the people in a group) to get into position (idiom)/(athletics) On your mark!

sentences.chinese: 请把这个通知用电子邮件发给各位经理。

sentences.english: Hello. Welcome to American Cafe. I'm Jody. So, Yang Chen, this is a big.
sentences.chinese: 各位听众好，欢迎到美语咖啡屋，我是杨晨。

sentences.english: Marion: Hello, my name's Marion. I'm a teacher here.
sentences.chinese: 各位好，我是玛丽昂，你们的课任老师。

sentences.english: Welcome interested in medical image Programming prawns you have exchanges together.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎有志于医学图像编程的各位大虾们一同交流。

sentences.english: Today very pleased to have this opportunity to visit together with you the beautiful HeZhou.
sentences.chinese: 今天非常高兴有机会与各位一起游览美丽的贺州。

sentences.english: Turning to the Rotary Foundation, I would like to share with you our vision on TRF Permanent Fund at this moment.
sentences.chinese: 我想在此与各位分享我们对扶轮永久基金的未来前景。

sentences.english: I regret to tell you that very many Americans lives have been lost.
sentences.chinese: 我沈痛地告诉各位，很多美国人丧失了生命。

sentences.english: Finally, I wish you all good luck and success in your career.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我谨祝各位日后工作顺利，前程锦绣。

sentences.english: The full, 57-minute podcast is highly recommended.
sentences.chinese: 我向各位大力推荐这部长达57分钟的播客。

sentences.english: To put every atom in its place—the vision articulated by some nanotechnologists—would require magic fingers.
sentences.chinese: 要让每个原子各就各位，需要魔术手指才办得到。

sentences.english: Click on the picture to see full size version.
sentences.chinese: 各位看官，一定记著“按”图放大，才看到多点细节。

sentences.english: The press conference now begins. I am ready to take your questions.
sentences.chinese: 记者会开始，现在我愿意回答各位的提问。

sentences.english: Sir, I hope that Perseus should think better of it.
sentences.chinese: 但是，各位绅士，我劝这位珀尔修斯先生三思而行。

sentences.english: Not due to sign a confidentiality agreement with you in advance notice, I am sorry. Edit translation.
sentences.chinese: 因签下了保密协议未能预先跟各位预告，实在抱歉。

definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
everyone/influential family/great expert
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
you (plural)
(of an area) vast or extensive/large-scale/widespread/(of people) numerous
dear reader/dear listener
darlings/fans/followers/short form of 親愛的們|亲爱的们
many/much/a lot/lots and lots/more/even more
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
oh (interjection indicating doubt or surprise)
to chant
you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
Have a nice weekend!
hereto/here
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
to return to the topic (idiom)/to get back to the main point
monarch/lord/gentleman/ruler
